description: Following years of experience in renowned restaurants, owner-chef Ciro Alberto has achieved his dream of opening his own place. With its clean lines and natural colour scheme, his restaurant has a slightly Nordic feel, while the reasonably priced cuisine demonstrates the imagination and creativity of a chef who is keen to stand out. Expertly prepared and attractively presented contemporary dishes are to the fore here.
